Chapters: 0:00 - New Features in SQL Server 2025: AI, Semantic Search, Vector Types, and Security 00:18:25 - Introduction of SQL Con â€” a new dedicated SQL data conference launching in 2026 00:20:07 - Transition to PostgreSQL discussion â€” community involvement and open-source contributions by Microsoft 00:25:02 - Horizon DB demo: provisioning in VS Code, AI integration with vector indexing and embeddings 00:26:22 - Using GPT-5 for AI-powered data extraction in SQL 00:35:15 - DocumentDB multi-cloud demo showing global consistency and failover 00:41:14 - Customer spotlight introduction: Adobe VP of Platform AI Engineering joins the stage 00:49:54 - Session recap: introducing four major database innovations including SQL 2025, Horizon DB, and Fabric integration 00:50:49 - Closing remarks: Gratitude and encouragement to explore detailed sessions and innovations

Title: Modern data modern apps: Innovation with Microsoft Databases | BRK134
